Zenbleed 攻击泄露 AMD Zen2 处理器的敏感数据https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/zenbleed-attack-leaks-sensitive-data-from-amd-zen2-processors/ Mon, 24 Jul 2023 17:28:38 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityHardware https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/zenbleed-attack-leaks-sensitive-data-from-amd-zen2-processors/ Google's security researcher Tavis Ormandy discovered a new vulnerability impacting AMD Zen2 CPUs that could allow a malicious actor to steal sensitive data, such as passwords and encryption keys, at a rate of 30KB/sec from each CPU core.
